mapper.insert: insert into recipe_review (recipe_id, comment, view_writer) values (#{recipeId}, #{comment}, #{viewWriter})
mapper.select: select rr.review_id, rr.recipe_id, rr.comment, rr.view_writer, rr.create_comment, rr.update_comment, rr.view_available, rr.board_level, u.profile from recipe_review rr join recipe_board rb on rr.recipe_id = rb.recipe_id join user u on rb.user_id = u.user_id where rr.recipe_id = #{recipeId} order by rr.review_id desc limit #{rcri.rpageStart}, #{rcri.rperPageNum}
select count(*) from recipe_review where recipe_id = #{recipeId}
mapper.update: update recipe_review set comment=#{comment} where review_id=#{reviewId}
